original_title: Met Department issues heat index advisory
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): The Met Department in its heat index advisory informing the general public said that the temperature felt on human body is expected to increase up to ‘Caution’ level at some places in Eastern and Northern provinces and Monaragala and Polonnaruwa Districts.
Its Director Shiromani Jayawardena says that the general public of the above mentioned areas to follow safety measures when exposed to sunlight.
Meanwhile, the Met Department predicts that Several spells of showers will occur in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central and North-Western provinces and in Galle and Matara districts.
The landslide warnings issued to 5 districts is still in effect.
